backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two features with associated frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files and components for reference.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining color variables, dark-mode variants, and global border/background styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling screen flow, loading transitions, and wrapping with theme and sound providers.
frontend/src/game/audio/SoundProvider.ts: Context provider for playing simple synthesized sound effects and toggling audio.
frontend/src/game/components/Achievement: Displays a temporary achievement toast with title and description when triggered.
frontend/src/game/components/ChoiceMiniG: Multiple‑choice mini‑game component handling selection, success/failure feedback, and continuation.
frontend/src/game/components/LootChest.t: Interactive loot chest component that plays sounds, reveals items, and advances on continue.
frontend/src/game/components/PixelHearts: Renders floating animated heart emojis with randomized positions and delays.
frontend/src/game/components/RewardToast: Shows a temporary toast with an icon and message when triggered.
frontend/src/game/components/SoundToggle: Button component that toggles game sound on or off.
frontend/src/game/components/UnlockSeque: Displays a sequence of unlockable text items with optional final message and completion handling.
frontend/src/game/flow.ts: Defines screen IDs, their progression order, and a helper to get the next screen.
frontend/src/game/GameShell.tsx: Provides shared game layout with background, animated effects, and sound toggle around screen content.
frontend/src/game/screens/BootScreen.tsx: Simulates a boot/loading sequence and then shows a start button to advance.
frontend/src/game/screens/EndingAchievem: Shows the final achievement screen with rewards, animations, and decorative hearts.
frontend/src/game/screens/FakeLoading.ts: Displays a fake loading screen with changing messages and a progress bar.
Guides the player through several steps ending in a Valentine proposal with interactive responses.
frontend/src/game/screens/index.ts: Exports all game screen components from a central index file.
frontend/src/game/screens/Level1OriginSt: Presents an origin-story sequence using UnlockSequence with a final reward message.
frontend/src/game/screens/Level2MemoryAr: Shows a set of memory items via UnlockSequence to progress the story.
Lists reasons the player is liked and triggers a reward toast before advancing.
frontend/src/game/screens/Level4SupportM: Shows supportive moments using UnlockSequence with a final completion message.
frontend/src/game/screens/LobbyScreen.ts: Renders a lobby UI showing player info, mode, a pending request card, and a start-match button with sound.
frontend/src/game/screens/MiniGame1Defus: Displays a defuse-themed mini-game using ChoiceMiniGame with predefined scenario, choices, and success state.
frontend/src/game/screens/MiniGame2LootC: Shows a LootChest mini-game that grants a single loot item and advances on completion.
frontend/src/game/screens/MiniGame3Penal: Implements a penalty-themed ChoiceMiniGame with specified question, choices, and success messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity using react-query, refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, authentication handling, and state management via AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, custom theme variables, component styles, and animation utilities for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, containers, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requests, and script requirements for the game proposal experience.
